description:
Get to your apps and content from anywhere.

PocketCloud® is a secure and fast way to browse content or run apps on your PC’s and Mac from your iPad, iPhone or iPod touch no matter where you are. Access your pictures, music, videos and applications like Excel, PowerPoint, Photoshop, games or any other program. 

Most Awarded App in Mobile Office App, Business App & Remote Access App Categories in 148App’s Best App Ever Awards 

“Wyse PocketCloud significantly ups the game for remote computer access from your iPhone” BusinessWeek.com 
“Wyse Turns iPad into Windows 7” - ComputerWeekly.com 
“The Windows iPhone” - Forbes.com 

Two Simple Setup Options: 
I) Auto Discovery (Recommended): PocketCloud enables easy access to your desktops with minimal setup and no technical know-how. Simply install PocketCloud on your iPad or iPhone from www.pocketcloud.com, download companion section and Sign In with your Gmail account.

II) Advanced setup: PocketCloud can also connect directly to machines running RDP or VNC. Simply enter the IP address or hostname to connect. 

REVIEWS 
“using it delivered one of those "Wow…I didn't know I was missing this feature until I had it" moments.” Gabe Knuth- BrianMadden.com 
“I had tried several other RDP type clients for the iPhone and none of them even came close to the functionality of the Wyse solution.” Calfo’s Blog 

FEATURES: 

- Search, Access all your stuff even if it's on your Mac/PC 
+Upload pictures and videos from your iOS device to your PC or Mac 
+Video Streaming thru File Browser: enjoy your video library over 3G/4G 
+Desktop Search: finding files is seamless 
+2GB of free cloud storage on Cloudbin 
+ Upload/download/share files up to 25MB in size 
+ Video/audio streaming for up to 30 seconds in length 

- Access all your apps from anywhere 
+Advanced high-accuracy Touch Pointer for instant mouse and keyboard control 
+iPad and iPhone 5 native full-resolution support and Retina Display support 
+Custom keyboard with function keys and short-cuts 
+Japanese keyboard support
+Multi-line text entry with copy/paste capability 
+VGA video out: connect to an external projector (iPad & iPhone 4+ only) 

Advanced features

- STATE OF THE ART DESKTOP REMOTING PROTOCOL (RDP) 
+Up to date with the latest RDP specification from Microsoft (RDP version 8.0) 
+Microsoft RD Gateway (TS Gateway) support 
+Best compression, optimized for 3G/4G 
+Enterprise grade security: 128-bit encryption, FIPS and NLA support 
+Clipboard redirection: Copy/Paste between iOS and Windows 

- VNC Support 
+Connect to Macs or Windows Home Editions 
+Secure 128-bit encryption when using Auto Discovery 

- Auto Discovery 
+Secure and easy setup using your Gmail account 
+No port-forwarding configuration required 
+Secure tunneling for VNC 
+Great for 3G/4G! 


- PocketCloud Premium* (In App Purchase - You need a Gmail Account to purchase Premium) 
+Browse and Connect to multiple computers 
+RDP 256-bit NLA/TLS encryption 
+Auto-fit and extended resolutions for RDP 
+3rd party app integration (URL scheme) 
+RDP File Redirection 
+Microsoft RD Gateway 
+32 bit color 
+Upload/download files up to 1GB in size 
+Unlimited video & audio streaming 
+Use across PocketCloud – iOS, Android, Desktop, Web and Chrome at no extra cost 
+Ad Free 

UPGRADE to PocketCloud Pro to add: 
+Browse and Connect to multiple computers 
+RDP 256-bit NLA/TLS encryption 
+Auto-fit and extended resolutions for RDP 
+3rd party app integration (URL scheme) 
+RDP File Redirection 
+Microsoft RD Gateway 
+32 bit color 
+ VMWare View support 
+Your single purchase will work on your iPad, iPhone and iPod touch. 


* To subscribe to Premium tap the PocketCloud Settings icon, then select Go Premium.

For support, please visit: http://pocketcloudsupport.wyse.com

SUPPORTED PLATFORMS 
+Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows 2008 
+Mac OS X 10.6 and higher
releaseNotes:
- Fixed issue with right click.
- Fixed issue with fit-to-screen when in portrait mode.
- Fn and Tab keys on the keyboard in landscape mode
- User can chose the orientation(portrait, landscape) of remote session in computer settings
- Japanese support
- Other user experience and stability improvements.
